Text.Page:
Hold on, there. This challenge is only for the boldest, the bravest, the wisest. Are you qualified?

Entry to the Vault of Allies requires a full party containing five alliance members or higher (no cadets!) each with a vault ticket.

I give access to the vault for Enlightened Union members.

Entry to the Vault of Allies requires a full party containing five alliance members. Each alliance member needs a vault ticket, and the vault ticket is consumed when you use the teleportal.
There's a change coming down the pike, friend. Campaigning will be a thing of the past. Soon, we'll choose our leaders based on their strength, or their skill, or the wisdom.
